raw_snippet: 224 Reloading the Launcher: Requires one full melee, 15 seconds, to man- The standard Juicer optics helmet offers passive nightvision and other ually reload the grenade launcher. As always, reloading an E-Clip takes optical enhancements. about five seconds or equal to one melee action/attack. The JA-11 is also has a canister energy cell similar to the new CS Black Market Cost: 21,000 credits. Grenades cost 400 credits apiece canister E-Clips, and this is presumably where the Coalition got the or 3800 a dozen. idea to develop the device. The difference between the two is that the canister on the JA-11 can not be physically removed from the rifle, but NG-33 Northern Gun can be recharged. Other than this, the energy cells work identically adding more power to the E-clip's capacity. In theâ€¦
